questions.question: Can you tell me what is the first month of the year?
Which month is the second month of the year?
What is the month after May?
questions.answer: June. The month after May is June.

questions.question: What is the month after October?
questions.answer: November. The month after October is November.

questions.question: Can you tell me the month after April?
Which month is the month after July?
questions.answer: August. The month after July is August.

questions.question: What’s the month after November?
questions.answer: December. The month after November is December.

questions.question: What’s the month after August?
questions.answer: September. The month after August is September.

questions.question: Is your city very hot in August?
questions.answer: Yes, it is. / No, it isn’t.

questions.question: Is your city very cold in May?
questions.answer: Yes, it is. / No, it isn’t.

questions.question: Does your city snow in November?
questions.answer: No, it doesn’t. / Yes, it does.

questions.question: Do you celebrate Christmas?
questions.answer: Yes, I do. / No, I don’t.

questions.question: When is Chinese New Year this year?
